description: This is a React component file App.js which implements a frontend notes application. It includes logic for loading, displaying, creating, updating, deleting notes, and managing UI state with hooks, along with rendering UI components such as NotesList and NoteEditor.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: React functional component that manages the notes application's state and UI.

methods.name: announce
methods.description: Announces messages to screen readers with timeout to ensure messages are read properly.

methods.name: handleCreateNote
methods.description: Creates a new note, updates state, and announces creation.

methods.name: handleSelectNote
methods.description: Handles selecting a note by ID.

methods.name: handleUpdateSelected
methods.description: Updates the currently selected note with provided changes.

methods.name: handleDeleteSelected
methods.description: Deletes the selected note after user confirmation.

methods.name: handleKeyDown
methods.description: Handles keyboard shortcuts for creating and deleting notes.
